content: Create comprehensive plan for new map layer system with privacy levels and time filtering - SPECIFIC plans for all 9 layers (3 privacy levels Ã— 3 data types) - EMPHASIZE PERFORMANCE
Get backend expert review of plan focusing on database queries, API design, and PERFORMANCE optimization strategies

Present final plan for user review and approval
Phase 1: Backend Implementation - privacy_level fields, robust Friendship model, unified endpoints, indexes, caching
Fix database schema mismatch and legacy field references
Fix serializer issues to separate GeoJSON and regular API responses
